file_content.text: An elite squad, doubtless constructed for this very purpose. Perhaps the Republic has some strategy after all.
A predictable choice. Only a Jedi could bring the Republic this far.
I'm pleased you survived to face me, Major. You've had a short but illustrious career.
The Republic trusts its victory to a simple mercenary. Will wonders never cease?
I've watched your progress across Corellia. The Speaker's Courtyard has been witness to it all.
From this historic stage, I'll declare Corellia an official member of the Empire. Even your efforts cannot sully that.
You really think the average Corellian will stand for that?
The people will resist.
The Corellians told their council to decide what was best.
The Corellian Council's been arrested. You've lost your support.
You don't have the authority.
So I've heard. But I won't allow their brave sacrifice to go to waste.
I'm declaring a Republic victory. Should be an interesting broadcast.
Our plans might conflict.
Because you've taken the Legislature? There's more to Corellia than Capitol Square.
When the Empire invaded, the council provided coordinates. Coronet City's docks were emptied. Those who resisted were killed.
The fleet moved into the shipyards. Imperial troops spread to Capitol Square. Truly, a glorious sight.
I doubt the Empire got a warm welcome.
And the people of Corellia?
Did you think the council emptied the docks themselves? More Corellians support the Empire than you realize.
I don't want to hear this.
One of your founders abandoned you. How much longer until Coruscant follows? Balmorra? Ord Mantell?
Soon the entire galaxy will realize your weakness. The Empire needs no weapons to destroy the Republic. Only time.
The Empire will have to get through the Jedi first.
The Order stands with them.
With pleasure.
Even if the Republic falls, our allies will keep fighting.
We don't fight alone.
They'll think twice, once they watch the Republic burn.
You keep waiting. In the meantime, I'll charge my weapon.
Not a smart strategy.
Do as you like. No weapon can save you now.
You'll turn on the galaxy like you turned on Corellia.
The Empire can't be trusted.
Those who cannot live by the law will die by it.
It's been a few thousand years. You must be pretty patient.
How's that working out?
The Republic is on its knees. I intend to see it fall.
The war ends here, on Corellia, with your death.
Your time's run out. [Attack]
If you truly believe that, the Republic's already lost.
You won't live to see it again.
Now I'm angry. [Attack]
Winning this battle will not win you the war.
The Republic's time is ending. The Empire's age has begun.
